strapiPost.title: Feeding the Region
strapiPost.content:
The University of Arkansas is full swing in its 5th annual Pack the Pantry food drive to celebrate Homecoming 2021 and prepare for the holiday season.

  • Collection: The food drive will run until Oct. 23 and will consist of both physical and financial donations. There are multiple locations on the U of A campus to drop off donations. The Full Circle Food Pantry will also be at the Homecoming football game on Saturday to collect donations.
  • Donate: The most common distributed items are things like canned goods, granola bars, rice/pasta, hygiene products, and a few others. The pantry has created an Amazon Wishlist, and items purchased are shipped directly to the Pantry office. 

Learn more HERE.
